definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
phablet (hybrid between a smart phone and a tablet)

sentences.english: Google can shut down its phone manufacturing operations, or sell it off.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌可以关停手机生产部门，或是再次将其出售。

sentences.english: You can also create ringtones out of songs you downloaded.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以将你下载的歌曲制作成手机铃声。

sentences.english: This new technology is sure to make waves in the cellular phone.
sentences.chinese: 最新的科技一定会在手机的领域中造成哄动。

sentences.english: Our peripheries are the professional markets of cellular phone accessories and the electronics product export.
sentences.chinese: 我们的周边是手机配件及电子产品出口的专业市场。

sentences.english: You shouldn't have to do those things, the phone should just work.
sentences.chinese: 你没必要做那些事情，那是手机本身就应该搞定的。

sentences.english: Please note that the activation code can be used only on a single phone and is not transferrable .
sentences.chinese: 请注意激活码只能在一台手机上使用，不可以传递。

sentences.english: By no means are BlackBerry phones unpopular.
See if cell-phone searches without a warrant should be illegal.
sentences.chinese: 了解下是否没有许可证进行手机搜索是合法的。

sentences.english: Aguero in the heart a fiercely, flip phones photograph of her son.
sentences.chinese: 许仪心中一凛，翻出手机上儿子的照片。

sentences.english: The robber grabbed the mobile phone away from the woman.
sentences.chinese: 抢劫犯把那名妇女的手机抢走了。

sentences.english: Turn off the phone and ignore incoming texts.
Cell phone service was not interrupted outside BART stations.
sentences.chinese: 在站外，手机通讯服务没有中断。

sentences.english: However, in Sichuan Changhong's color TV sets and mobile phones will have better performance.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在四川长虹的彩电和手机将有更好的表现。

sentences.english: Most boys keep them locked in their lockers and they're turned off.
sentences.chinese: 大多数男孩子把手机锁在储物柜里，并把手机关掉。

sentences.english: (against) Using a cell phone while driving is against the traffic rules.
sentences.chinese: 边开车边打手机是违反交通规则的。

sentences.english: How much sales has music handsets brought for Nokia in 2006?
sentences.chinese: 2006年诺基亚音乐手机带来的销售额有多大？

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
to turn off (a machine or device)/to finish shooting a film
phablet (hybrid between a smart phone and a tablet)
